original: Hylander, Karl Samuel, kyrkoherde, Malexander, f. 31/8/02 i Sthlm av missionären Nils _H. o. Edla Hedberg. G. 31 m. Viola Lennsten. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 22, fil. kand. i Upps. 29, teol. kand. samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 31. V. kommin. i Skedevi 32, v. |)astor i Vireda s. å., i Normlösa o. Herrberga 33, kyrkoh. i Malexander sed. 34. Ordf. i skolstyr. o. kj^rkostämma i Malexander, ordf. i Malexanders hem-bygdsfören. 35-44. Äv. verks. s. övers.
translated: Hylander, Karl Samuel, clergyman, Malexander, born August 31st, 1902 in Stockholm to missionary Nils _H. and Edla Hedberg. Married in 1931 to Viola Lennsten. - Graduated from high school in Stockholm in 1922, received a Bachelor's degree from Uppsala University in 1929, and a Bachelor of Theology degree and ordination from Linköping diocese in 1931. Became a curate in Skedevi in 1932, assistant pastor in Vireda the same year, in Normlösa and Herrberga in 1933, and pastor in Malexander since 1934. Chairman of the school board and parish meeting in Malexander, chairman of the Malexander local history society from 1935 to 1944. Also published works as a translator.
